DOC.detailed_description: Population : All male non-pregnant female undergo knee arthroplasty . Study Design : Prospective , consecutive series unlimited number patient . Data Collection Clinic Data : Patient Demographics- age , weight , height , gender , affected side , co-morbidities , current medication , contact information Knee Society Score SF-12 Evaluation radiographs- AP , ML , merchant view Preop lab result Surgical Data : Surgical approach ASA level Size implant , catalog lot number Time surgery Estimated blood loss ( ml ) Length incision ( cm ) Intraoperative ROM Any peculiar finding ( i.e . heterotopic bone , large osteophyte , etc . ) Preop lab result Postoperative Data Sf-12 Modified Knee Society Score Quad strength test Evaluation radiograph , AP , ML , merchant view
